  sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. She designed and custom-made wedding gowns using elaborate laces imported from Europe. This wedding gown with a long train holds special significance as it was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister
 Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy) for her wedding on 28 November 1947.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. She designed and custom-made wedding gowns using elaborate laces imported from Europe. This wedding gown with a long train holds special significance as it was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister, Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy) for her wedding on 28 November 1947.
